commit message:
Merge pull request #39 from szimszon/master

Hungarian translation

monitor downloaded files and automatically upload if modified

* FileMonitorService would watch all cached files on startup
* When a new file is downloaded, it would be added to the watch list
* When an account is removed, its files would be removed from the watch list
retry auto upload if it fails

handle the case when a cached file is replaced by the latest version

If a file was cached, and the version on the server is changed, the download of the
latest version would trigger a file change event. We work around this by save the
time of the download, and ignore the immediate event triggered after the download.
[file mon] only handle file update broadcast
fixed ShareToSeafileActivity when there are multiple accounts
fixed layout of multiple file chooser
do not show 'modified' in file list
provide drawables for different screen densities
set list view backgorund to white
